titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.
A bill to extend and modify the suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the temporary suspension of duty on certain catalytic converter mats of ceramic fibers.
